targets.expr:
sum (
    sum by (namespace,pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",node=~"$node"})
    * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (
        kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1
    )
)
- sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",node=~"$node"}[5m]))

panels.description: CPU request is less than the average daily usage, and at least 10m under-reservation

targets.expr:
topk(20,
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[1m])[1d:]))
    -
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})
    > 0.010
)
and
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})
    > 0
)
and
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[1m])[1d:]))
    /
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})
    > 1
)
)

panels.title: Top CPU under reservation / daily average

panels.description: CPU request is more than twice the 99 percentile daily usage, and at least 10m over-reservation

targets.expr:
topk(20,
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})
    -
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (quantile_over_time(0.99,rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",container!=""}[1m])[1d:]))
    > 0.01
) and (
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (quantile_over_time(0.99,rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",container!=""}[1m])[1d:]))
    /
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"})
    < 1
)
)

panels.title: Top CPU over reservation / daily 99 percentile

targets.expr:
avg by(node) (
    avg by(internal_ip) (
        label_replace(
            avg by(instance) (
                node_memory_MemFree_bytes
            ),
            "internal_ip",
            "$1",
            "instance",
            "([^:]+):.*"
        )
    )
    * on(internal_ip) group_right
    kube_node_info
)

avg by(node) (
    avg by(internal_ip) (
        label_replace(
            avg by(instance) (
                node_memory_Cached_bytes
            ),
            "internal_ip",
            "$1",
            "instance",
            "([^:]+):.*"
        )
    )
    * on(internal_ip) group_right
    kube_node_info
)

avg by(node) (
    avg by(internal_ip) (
        label_replace(
            avg by(instance) (
                node_memory_MemFree_bytes + node_memory_Cached_bytes
            ),
            "internal_ip",
            "$1",
            "instance",
            "([^:]+):.*"
        )
    )
    * on(internal_ip) group_right
    kube_node_info
)

avg by(node) (
    avg by(internal_ip) (
        label_replace(
            avg by(instance) (
                node_memory_Buffers_bytes
            ),
            "internal_ip",
            "$1",
            "instance",
            "([^:]+):.*"
        )
    )
    * on(internal_ip) group_right
    kube_node_info
)

sum (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory",node=~"$node"})
-
sum (
    sum by (namespace,pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",node=~"$node"})
    * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (
        kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1
    )
)

sum (
    sum by (namespace,pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",node=~"$node"})
    * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (
        kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1
    )
)
-
sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="",node=~"$node"})

panels.description: memory request is less than the average daily usage, and at least 10MB under-reservation

targets.expr:
topk(20,
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="",container!=""}[1d:]))
    -
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"})
    > 0.010
)
and
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"})
    > 0
)
and
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="",container!=""}[1d:]))
    /
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"})
    > 1
)
)

panels.title: Top memory under reservation / daily average

panels.description: Memory request is more than max daily usage, and at least 10Mb over-reservation

targets.expr:
topk(20,
(
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"})
    -
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="",container!=""}[1d:]))
    > 10*1024*1024
) and (
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="",container!=""}[1d:]))
    /
    avg by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"})
    < 1
)
)

panels.title: Top Memory over reservation / daily percentile

panels.description: containers using more memory than requested are at risk of eviction

targets.expr:
(
    (
        sum by(container, namespace, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{node=~"$node",container!=""})
        -
        sum by(container, namespace, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",node=~"$node"})
    )
    or
    (
        sum by(container, namespace, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{node=~"$node",container!=""})
    )
) > 0 * 1024 * 1024

panels.title: Memory usage over request
